titles: By the King. A proclamation to inform all our loving subjects of the lawfulnesse of our commissions of Array, issued into the severall counties of our realm of England, and dominion of Wales, and of the use of them and commanding them to obey our commissioners therein named, in the execution of their said commissions.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
place: Imprinted at York, and now reprinted at London :
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
At end of text: Given at Our court in York the twentieth day of June, in the eighteenth Yeer of Our Reign, 1642.
keywords: Prerogative, Royal --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Civil War, 1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  Politics and government --  1642-1649 --  Early works to 1800.
